page.title: 12Clubs
page.content: There are a great many clubs in the Ringwould / Kingsdown area. These vary in size and cater for people of all ages, and from all walks of life. For the children of the area, the clubs include the various branches of the scouting movement and the youth club. There are a number of sports clubs covering,Football Cricket, Golf, Angling and Sailing.In addition to these, for the ladies in the villages, there are the Mothers Union, the Womens Institute and the Ringwould/Kingsdown Wednesday Circle for young wives. For the older people in the area,there is the Darby and Joan club and the Ringwould Monday Club.The St.Nicholas players are the drama group and there is a Whist club as well as the local History Society. The church has a number of clubs including the Sunday School.
